name: Edo Superstar
blurb: A fighting RPG with a gorgeous Japanese style! Every backer gets a free download of the game! OS / Android / Windows Phone / PC / Mac

rewards.reward: A copy of the game on all available systems, by digital download. (PC / Mac / iOS / Android / Windows Phone.) You may download a copy for each system. Note: All other reward tiers also include a download of the game.

Art Book / Strategy Guide (PDF) - Tons of original art, character bios, and gameplay tips. Bonus hints, secrets, and exclusive cheat codes. All reward levels include a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

CHARACTER ART CARDS - 12 original character designs. Tengu, Fox, Tanuki, Mountain Cat and many more! Printed on 5x7 inch heavy matte paper. Archival. Perfect for collecting or sending Holiday wishes to friends! New characters posted in daily Kickstarter updates - keep watching to see them all! To add these to your current pledge, just add $20. In early September, you can tell us how many sets you got in the Reward Survey. \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666 PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

EPIC BATTLE T-SHIRT! Printed on American Apparel fine jersey tee. Gives +3 attack when equipped! After the campaign ends, we'll send a survey where you can choose the color, cut (men's/women's) and size (S~XXXL). To combine this reward with any other level, just add $30 to your pledge. Free shipping to US. \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide!

CERTAIN VICTORY - One authentic, handmade woodblock print of the 'Certain Victory' design. Features an intricate, embossed fabric texture.   Ships straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop.  Free shipping to anywhere in the world!    \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

8-BIT FUJI - One authentic, handmade woodblock print of the '8-Bit Fuji' design. Each pixel was hand-carved under Dave's knife! 1980s meets 1780s! Ships straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop.  Free shipping to anywhere in the world!  \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide!

BLING - One authentic, handmade woodblock print of the 'Bling' design. Features historic Edo Era coinage! Guaranteed to bring great fortune. Ships straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop.  Free shipping to anywhere in the world! \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

WAVE - One authentic, handmade woodblock print of the 'Wave' design. Based on the classic summer festival robes (happi), seen all over Japan! Ships straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop. Free shipping to anywhere in the world!  \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

THE ONE-TWO PUNCH! - One handmade woodblock print of your choice, PLUS one Epic Battle T-Shirt. You can choose your print design and shirt specifications in our reward survey after the Kickstarter ends.*Note: Shirt delivers by November 2013, while the print may be later, depending on your choice of design. \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666 PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

WOODBLOCK DEFENDER - Two authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. Choose your designs in the online survey after the Kickstarter campaign ends. *Note: Delivery dates may be be later than November, based on what designs you order. \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide!

WOODBLOCK CHAMPION - Three authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. Choose your designs in the online survey after the Kickstarter campaign ends. *Note: Delivery dates may be be later than November, based on what designs you order. \u2666 Includes PDF download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

WOODBLOCK SUPERSTAR - Collector's set!  All four authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. *Note: Delivery dates may be be later than November, based on what designs you order. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits! \u2666 PLUS download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide!

ELITE COLLECTOR'S SET - One original sumi-e painting by Jed Henry, featuring any Edo Superstar character.  (Measures 12 x 17, on handmade Japanese paper).  \u2666 PLUS all four authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. \u2666 PLUS an Epic Battle T-Shirt. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits! \u2666 PLUS download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide!

BETA TESTER - Enter the inner circle! Access to every version of the game until launch. Your suggestions will be considered throughout the development process. \u2666 PLUS all four authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. \u2666 PLUS an Epic Battle T-Shirt. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits! \u2666 PLUS download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

ART DIRECTOR - Help us design a custom karate suit for Masaru, which will appear in the final game. You dream it, and Jed will help you design it!  \u2666 PLUS Beta Tester access to every version of the game until launch. \u2666 PLUS all four authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. \u2666 PLUS an Epic Battle T-Shirt. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits! \u2666 PLUS download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

GAME DESIGNER - Help design one of Masaru's power moves! Gamers around the world will use your technique to vanquish evil!  \u2666 PLUS Beta Tester access to every version of the game until launch. \u2666 PLUS all four authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. \u2666 PLUS an Epic Battle T-Shirt. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits! \u2666 PLUS download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER - Help us design a boss fight - everything from art to gameplay! \u2666 PLUS help design one of Masaru's power moves! \u2666 PLUS help us design a custom karate suit for Masaru, which will appear in the final game. \u2666 PLUS Beta Tester access to every version of the game until launch. \u2666 PLUS all four authentic, handmade woodblock prints, shipped straight from Dave Bull's Tokyo workshop, one by one, as they are ready. \u2666 PLUS an Epic Battle T-Shirt. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits! \u2666 PLUS download of the Art Book/Strategy Guide! \u2666  PLUS a free download of the game in autumn of 2014.
